Cross-Site Scripting Attacks: How to Protect Your Website
entries.description: Cross-site scripting attacks are a major risk to any business that develops websites or web apps. But there are ways to protect against XSS attacks. Here's how.

entries.title: Easy SVG Customization And Animation: A Practical Guide
entries.description: Developers often feel discouraged from editing SVG markup and experimenting with SVG animations, thinking it’s a significant time investment or they need to use a complex animation library to do so. In this article, Adrian showcases his favorite tricks, which make the process streamlined and fun.

entries.title: Uno Platform 4.7 – New Project Template, Performance Improvements and more
entries.description: Our first release of 2023 is ready and brings over 230 new features and bug fixes, most notably introducing a new project template, improving performance across all platforms supported by Uno Platform and Shared Fonts.

entries.title: Using .NET code from JavaScript using WebAssembly
entries.description: Blazor WebAssembly allows to run a .NET web application in a browser. Starting with .NET 7, you can easily run any .NET method from JavaScript without needing the whole Blazor framework.

entries.title: Watch out, software engineers: ChatGPT is now finding, fixing bugs in code
